Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G2250>day:<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> they that <S%G2518>sleep<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%> in the <S%G3571>night;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they that be <S%G3182>drunken<s%> are <S%G3184>drunken<s%> in the <S%G3571>night.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G2249>us,<s%> who <S%G5607>are<s%> of the <S%G2250>day,<s%> be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> putting <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for a <S%G4030>helmet,<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

Who <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> <S%G2443>that,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> we <S%G1127>wake<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2518>sleep,<s%> we should <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G3870>comfort<s%> yourselves <S%G240>together,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3618>edify<s%> one <S%G1520>another,<s%> <S%G1520><s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> ye <S%G4160>do.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2065>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> to <S%G1492>know<s%> them which <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G4291>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2233>esteem<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> very <S%G5228>highly<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> for their work's <S%G1223>sake.<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2041><s%> And be at <S%G1514>peace<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves.<s%>

Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> <S%G3842>evermore.<s%>
Pray <S%G4336><s%> without <S%G89>ceasing.<s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956>thing<s%> give <S%G2168>thanks:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us.<s%>
